rune.author: billythegoat101 (Demonstrations pack)
rune.sacrifices:
Sacrifice - 4x Snow Block + 1x Ghast Tear + 20 XP levels
Notes - Will last for a three days unless fueled.
rune.description:
Description Summons a sprite which follows the player and freezes the surface of liquids. Water turns to ice and lava turns to obsidian.
Demonstrates Item sacrifices, XP Sacrifices, Powered runes, Pausing, and Following sprites.
